item.description:
Changing the location for the last time. David has graciously offered up his home in Wolcott with the caveat that we all make sure to stay and clean up. Jim - if you could still bring a table with some extra chairs, it'll be good to have a backup for extra seating.

Below is the list of what everyone is bringing.  Since this is a potluck, please make sure you let us know by the end of the day what you are bringing. It's fair that if you're going to eat, you should bring something to contribute. Either post on here or text Jocelyn at (716) 307-6590 or Christian at (860) 357-7264.

Christian & Melissa - Spanish Rice

Brett - Jalepeno Cornbread and (Squash or Mashed Sweet Potatoes)

Andi - Apple crisp

Jocelyn - Turkey and gravy (may bring something else if I have time)

John P. - Pumpkin Pie

Jim - greenbean casserole and a table with chairs

Julianne - maybe refreshments/drinks?

Mary - manicotti

Tom - plates/silverware and dessert

Neha - vegetarian appetizer

JP - chocolate pudding pie and potatoes

Jenn - ?

Dave - hot wings and steamed dumplings
item.how_to_find_us: On the corner, there is a fire hydrant and a stop sign on a large front lawn.
item.name: Thanksgiving Potluck
